meanings.definition: The small bone at the end of the vertebral column in humans, formed by the fusion of vestigial caudal vertebrae.
meanings.sent1: My tailbones help support my body when I sit.
meanings.sent2: She landed hard on her tailbones after slipping on the ice.
meanings.sent3: The chair complained when I put too much weight on my tailbones.
meanings.sent4: His tailbones felt like fragile beads strung together.
meanings.sent5: I could feel every bump in the road jostling my tailbones.

meanings.definition: The part of a garment that hangs down at the back.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful bow at the tailbones.
meanings.sent2: The coat's tailbones swayed in the wind as she walked.
meanings.sent3: He tripped over the long tailbones of his robe.
meanings.sent4: The curtains had intricate tailbones that added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The flag's tailbones fluttered proudly in the breeze.
